overview: Joe Salesky is the co-founder and chief strategy officer at FreeMonee, and draws upon his 25 years of management experience in providing business solutions to Fortune 100 businesses. Prior to founding FreeMonee, Joe served as the President and CEO of Clairmail; CEO and founder of PictureTalk, Inc. (presently Pixion) and Skytron Corporation; as well as, the CTO of AppStream. Additionally, he held key executive positions at nCUBE and Oracle. Joe contributed to the development and received patents on technologies now part of enterprise infrastructure, including the original patent for web-conferencing.
